#### Wadjet {-}
<div class="col2">
*Wȝḏy.t ỉr.t ỉȝbt.t nt Itm  *  
*ḏỉ=s snb nb  *  
*n zȝ-Rʿ  *  
*(twmtyns ḫwỉ)|  *  
    
Wadjet, the left eye of Atum.  
She gives all health   
to the son of Re,  
(Domitian Augustus)|  

</div>
